headline: American Financial Okays Special Dividend to Share More Profit
summary: AFG's board approves a special dividend of $2 per share, which testifyies to the insurer's strong financial position and long-term growth prospects.

headline: W. R. Berkley (NYSE:WRB) Launches Berkley Embedded Solutions With Stephanie Lloyd As President
summary: W. R. Berkley (NYSE:WRB) has seen a notable development with the formation of Berkley Embedded Solutions, a new initiative aimed at integrating modern technology with digital-first insurance products. This venture, led by experienced executive Stephanie Lloyd, aligns with the company's ongoing growth strategy, potentially influencing their stock performance. Over the past month, W. R. Berkley's share price rose 7.2%, which stands out against a broader market decline of 1.3% within the same...

headline: W. R. Berkley Corporation Announces the Formation of Berkley Embedded Solutions
summary: GREENWICH, Conn., March 03, 2025--W. R. Berkley Corporation (NYSE: WRB) today announced the formation of Berkley Embedded Solutions to deliver tailored insurance products and services to customers at the point of purchase. This new business will bring together the best of modern technology, purpose-built digital-first insurance products, and complementary services with Berkley’s strong underwriting culture and reach. Stephanie Lloyd has been named president of the new business, effective immedia
